Title: Net Overlay Beaded Evening Dress

Featured-image: 1501-mocha-net-overlay-beaded-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: An elegant gown for any special event. The capped sleeves, neckline, and bodice are all shimmering with applique and sparkling jewels. The edges are slightly scalloped and the back features a sheerness of the upper back. The pleated chiffon skirt flows to the floor for a classic look.
